name: A Cat...
description:
A game about a cat living the dream.

Slumbering all day - adventuring all night. That's how we imagine a cat's dream life.

We don't want to reveal too much about "A Cat..." here in the description as exploration is an essential part of the game-experience. However, the screenshots might give you some hints about the game ;)

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
